00125 void sixlowpanSleep_dataReceived (uint16_t src)
00126 {
00127     //Only continue the check if we are awaiting wakeup...
00128     if (wakeup_information[src].destPort)
00129     {
00130         if ((HTONS(UIP_UDP_BUF->destport) == wakeup_information[src].destPort) &&
00131             (uip_ipaddr_cmp(&UIP_IP_BUF->destipaddr, &wakeup_information[src].destAddr)))
00132             {
00133                 wakeup_information[src].destPort = 0;
00134             }
00135     }
00136 
00137     return;
00138 }

00149 void sixlowpanSleep_wakeupSent(uint16_t shortaddress, uip_ipaddr_t * ipaddr, uint16_t port)
00150 {
00151     wakeSent = 1;
00152 
00153     //Check this is possible
00154     if (shortaddress >= MAXNODES)
00155     {
00156         return;
00157     }
00158 
00159     //Store the information...
00160     wakeup_information[shortaddress].destAddr = *ipaddr;
00161     wakeup_information[shortaddress].destPort = port;
00162 
00163     return;
00164 }

00172 void sixlowpanSleep_awakeReceived(uint16_t shortaddress)
00173 {
00174 
00175     /* Check if we are waiting on them */
00176     if (!wakeup_information[shortaddress].destPort)
00177     {
00178         return;
00179     }
00180 
00181     /* We create a special packet, a UDP packet with the previously
00182      * stored srcAddr & srcPort. */
00183 
00184     uip_len = 0;
00185 
00187     UIP_IP_BUF->vtc = 0x60; /* IPv6, 0 traffic class */
00188     UIP_IP_BUF->flow = 0;   /* 0 flow */
00189     UIP_IP_BUF->len[0] = UIP_UDPH_LEN + 1;    /* 8 UDP Header Bytes + 1 UDP Payload */
00190     UIP_IP_BUF->len[1] = 0;
00191     UIP_IP_BUF->ttl = 64;   /* 64-hop limit */
00192     UIP_IP_BUF->proto = UIP_PROTO_UDP;
00193 
00194     /* Make packet look like it comes from original server */
00195     UIP_IP_BUF->srcipaddr = wakeup_information[shortaddress].destAddr;
00196 
00197     /* Destination is based on short address.. */
00198     //The coordinator has a short address of zero, so we just use it's IPv6 address
00199     //here. We can then replace the lower two bytes with the short address we want..
00200     UIP_IP_BUF->destipaddr = uip_netif_physical_if[INTERFACE_802154].addresses[1].ipaddr;
00201     UIP_IP_BUF->destipaddr.u8[14] = MSB(shortaddress);
00202     UIP_IP_BUF->destipaddr.u8[15] = LSB(shortaddress);
00203 
00204     /* UDP Header */
00205     UIP_UDP_BUF->destport = HTONS(WAKEUP_PORT);
00206     UIP_UDP_BUF->srcport = HTONS(wakeup_information[shortaddress].destPort);
00207     UIP_UDP_BUF->udplen = HTONS(UIP_UDPH_LEN + 1);
00208 
00209     /* UDP Payload */
00210     uip_buf[UIP_IPH_LEN + UIP_UDPH_LEN] = 'w';
00211 
00212     /* Checksummer */
00213     UIP_UDP_BUF->udpchksum = 0;
00214 
00215     /* Calculate UDP checksum. */
00216     UIP_UDP_BUF->udpchksum = ~(uip_udpchksum());
00217     if(UIP_UDP_BUF->udpchksum == 0) {
00218       UIP_UDP_BUF->udpchksum = 0xffff;
00219     }
00220 
00221     uip_len = UIP_IPH_LEN + UIP_UDPH_LEN + 1;
00222 
00223     /* Send data out */
00224     tuip_interface_set(INTERFACE_802154);
00225     tcpip_ipv6_output();
00226 }

00290 void sixlowpanSleep_sendAwake(void)
00291 {
00292     /* We only want to send this once per             *
00293      * wake cycle, as otherwise we are wasting power! */
00294 
00295     uint8_t frame[1];
00296 
00297     frame[0] = ATMEL_GET_AWAKE;
00298 
00299     if (!wakeSent || !RUMSLEEP)
00300     {
00301         macsixlowpanDataRequest(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR, 1, frame);
00302         wakeSent = 1;
00303     }
00304 }

00337 static uint16_t sleepCount;

00346 void sixlowpanSleep_periodic(void)
00347 {
00348     sixlowpanSleep_sendAwake();
00349 
00350     perSetup = 0;
00351 
00352     sleepCount++;
00353 
00354     if ((sleepCount == SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_APP_TIME) && SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_APP_TIME)
00355     {
00356         /* Send the periodic message */
00357         macSetAlarm(7, sixlowpan_application_periodic);
00358         sleepCount = 0;
00359     }
00360 
00361     sixlowpanSleep_checkSleep();
00362 }

00371 void sixlowpanSleep_checkSleep(void)
00372 {
00373     //Don't do anything when waiting on response!
00374     //if (macConfig.busy)
00375     //    return;
00376 
00377     if ((macConfig.sleeping) && (RUMSLEEP))
00378     {
00379        /* Check if anyone wants us to wake up... */
00380        //if (!VLP)
00381        //macSetAlarm(30, sixlowpanSleep_sendAwake);
00382 
00383        /* Otherwise go to sleep */
00384        macSetAlarm(50, sixlowpanSleep_sleep);
00385     }
00386     else
00387     {
00388         /* Setup periodic timer if we should be awake still! */
00389         sixlowpanSleep_setupPeriodic();
00390     }
00391 }

00401 void sixlowpanSleep_setupPeriodic(void)
00402 {
00403     //Don't let user call this multiple times! Would set multiple timers...
00404     if (perSetup)
00405         return;
00406 
00407     perSetup = 1;
00408 
00409 
00410         // Less than 6.5 seconds
00411         if (SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME < 65)
00412         {
00413             if (SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME)
00414                 macSetAlarm(SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME * 100, sixlowpanSleep_periodic);
00415             else
00416                 macSetAlarm(5000, sixlowpanSleep_periodic); /* Default of 5 S */
00417         }
00418         // More than 65 seconds
00419         else
00420         {
00421                 macSetLongAlarm(SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME / 10 , sixlowpanSleep_periodic);
00422         }
00423 }

00432 void sixlowpanSleep_sleep(void)
00433 {
00434     if (NODETYPE == ENDDEVICE)
00435     {
00436         // Don't sleep if we've been woken up, restart the
00437         // periodic timer & perform the 'awake' action
00438         // Don't wake up though if we are in VLP mode
00439         if (!macConfig.sleeping)
00440         {
00441             sixlowpanSleep_setupPeriodic();
00442 
00443            // if (!VLP)
00444             sixlowpanSleep_sendAwake();
00445         }
00446 
00447         //Check if the MAC Is busy - if so don't kill it,
00448         //let's try again in a bit
00449         //else if (macConfig.busy)
00450         //{
00451         //    macSetAlarm(10, sixlowpanSleep_sleep);
00452         //}
00453         else
00454         {
00455             //Going to sleep!
00456             wakeSent = 0;
00457 
00458             SLEEPING();
00459             if (SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME)
00460                 nodeSleep(SIXLOWPAN_PERIODIC_TIME);
00461             else
00462                 nodeSleep(50); /* Default of 5 S */
00463             NOT_SLEEPING();
00464 
00465             sixlowpanSleep_periodic();
00466         }
00467     }
00468     else
00469     {
00470         sixlowpanSleep_setupPeriodic();
00471     }
00472 
00473     return;
00474 }
